code: import{SAVE_TODO,DELETE_TODO,IS_DONE,TOGGLE_EDIT,CHANGE_TODO}from"../common/types";export var saveTodo=function saveTodo(task){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:SAVE_TODO,payload:{task:task}});}catch(err){console.log("err",err);}};};export var deleteTodo=function deleteTodo(id){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:DELETE_TODO,payload:{id:id}});}catch(err){console.log("err",err);}};};export var isDone=function isDone(id,checked){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:IS_DONE,payload:{id:id,checked:checked}});}catch(err){console.log("err",err);}};};export var toggleEdit=function toggleEdit(id,isEdit){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:TOGGLE_EDIT,payload:{id:id,isEdit:!isEdit}});}catch(err){console.log("err",err);}};};export var changeTodo=function changeTodo(id,task){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:CHANGE_TODO,payload:{id:id,task:task}});}catch(err){console.log("err",err);}};};
